Description.Text: Right in the center of New York City is a comfortable, spacious room just for you, with a friendly and helpful staff – a home away from home in the center of it all. The Salisbury is conveniently located across from Carnegie Hall, only a short walk to famous Fifth Avenue shopping and steps away from Central Park. Other attractions only steps away include Lincoln Center, Radio City Music Hall, Museum of Modern Art and Broadway theaters.

• Carnegie Hall • Lincoln Center • Time Warner Center • Museum of Modern Art • Folk Art Museum • Museum of Art & Design • Rockefeller Center,Radio City Music Hall • Grand Central Terminal • United Nations • Madison Square Garden,Penn Station • New York Public Library • Empire State Building • Times Square • Metropolitan Museum of Art • Frick Collection • Whitney Museum of Contemporary Art • Central Park Zoo • Museum of Natural History

Conveniently located steps near Times Square the Salisbury Hotel in midtown Manhattan lodging accommodations include 119 standard guest rooms, 81 one bedroom suites and 4 two bedroom suites. The Salisbury Hotel offers a mix of king and double-bed rooms. Standard rooms are much larger than typical New York City hotel rooms, since the Salisbury was originally designed as a suite hotel.All rooms offer flat screen TV, direct dial telephones with voice mail, large walk-in closets with safes; most rooms and all suites have serving pantries featuring microwave ovens, coffee makers, refrigerators and sinks.

The Salisbury Hotel’s brick-and-stone Neo-Gothic facade complements a marble-walled interior with carved-wood moldings and fresh flowers. Guests include visiting artists performing at Carnegie Hall across the street, along with families and other vacationers who appreciate the terrific Midtown New York location and smoke-free policy.
• Ice skating • Swimming • Rowing or canoeing • Running track/path • Basketball • Tennis • Hiking/biking trails • Bicycle rentals • Horse riding/rental • Fishing • Playground
Pets not allowed Check-in time is 2 PM Check-out time is Noon

From JFK International Airport: Follow Signs To The Van Wyck Expressway North Until You See Signs For Grand Central Expressway West. Go For About Two Miles Until You See Signs For Long Island Expressway I-495. Take It West To The Midtown Tunnel, when You Exit The Tunnel Go To Third Avenue And Turn Right Onto It. Go To 57th Street, Turn Left On 57th Street And Go To 123 West 57th Street. Between 6th And 7th Avenues.
From LaGuardia Airport: Take Grand Central Expressway To Triboro Bridge-follow Sign For Manhattan*S Fdr Drive. Go To 63rd Street-exit And Go Straight To 2nd, Turn Left On 2nd Avenue And Go To 57th Street. Go To 123 West 57th Street. Between 6th And 7th Avenues.

Continental breakfast buffet is available everyday from 7am-11am in the third floor dining room. Room Service is available from a variety of restaurants in the area for delivery from early morning until late evening. • Angelo's • Great American Health Bar • Stage Deli • China Regency
This 3 star hotel is located in the city centre of New York. It is a short drive away from the Omini Centre Edinburgh.
